title: DELISSIO Rising Crust Spicy Chicken Deluxe
description:
There’s nothing quite like a classic rising crust pizza topped with your favourite ingredients. DELISSIO Rising Crust Pizza Spicy Chicken tops a high-rising, thick crust with spicy grilled chicken, red and green peppers, and finely chopped onions  – bringing spicy, and savoury flavours together in one! Whether treating yourself or pleasing a crowd, the soft and fluffy crust with a crispy outside makes every night an irresistible pizza night. Made with high quality ingredients, it’s no wonder DELISSIO is the Most Trusted Frozen Pizza Brand in Canada*. It’s easy to cook up a delish pizza that tastes just like delivery. It’s not delivery, It’s DELISSIO!
*BrandSpark International inc. 2017/2018
features: A classic, thick crust with a fluffy inside, topped with spicy grilled chicken, red and green peppers, and finely chopped onions
Made with only quality ingredients, DELISSIO is the Most Trusted Frozen Pizza Brand in Canada*
Quick and easy way to turn any night into a mouth-watering pizza night – perfect for a night in, pleasing the crowd, or a tasty appetizer
Add your favourite ingredients for your own pizza personalization
The only door you need to open is your oven. It’s not delivery, it’s DELISSIO!

description: NESTLÉ's LES RECETTES DE L'ATELIER Dark Chocolate Muesli and Caramelized Hazelnut (100 g) is crafted with nuts, crunchy muesli and artisanal flair. Inspired by the passion of NESTLÉ Swiss chocolatiers, each piece with its visible inclusions is uniquely delightful. Crafted with passion, made with sustainable sourced cocoa, certified by UTZ, and the finest-sourced quality ingredients, this premium dark chocolate bar is a uniquely delicious and decadent experience. Each inviting piece is visibly unique and authentically made with intense dark chocolate bursting with a crunchy, European muesli mix of oats, almonds, pumpkin seeds, and sunflower seeds with caramel-enrobed hazelnuts. An indulgent experience that perfectly balances taste and textures, it's a true chocolate lovers' chocolate bar that can be enjoyed on its own or paired with charcuterie, cheeses and wines to entertain friends and family.

With only 50 calories and 9 g of sugar per 50 ml bar, and no artificial colours or flavours, you get all of the natural goodness of strawberries. Why mess with what nature has perfected? title: NESCAFE Sweet & Creamy Iced Original Instant Coffee Mix
description: NESCAFÉ Sweet & Creamy Instant Iced Coffee Mix makes a deliciously sweet and creamy tasting cup of iced coffee! Part of a range of all-in-one instant coffees, NESCAFÉ Sweet & Creamy Instant Iced Coffee sachets are perfectly prepared each time, as each single-serve sachet includes the ideal amount of coffee, whitener, and sugar. To prepare, empty one instant coffee sachet into a mug, add cold water and ice, and stir to enjoy a consistently delicious and creamy tasting cup of iced coffee. NESCAFÉ Sweet & Creamy Instant Iced Coffee Mix has a smooth, creamy coffee taste and a rich coffee aroma – the perfect choice for home, office or on the go, so everyone can enjoy their favourite coffee anytime, anywhere. NESCAFÉ Sweet & Creamy Instant Iced Coffee Mix is made with 100% responsibly sourced coffee. NESCAFÉ plans to continue helping 100,000+ coffee farmers with programs that aim to improve resilience to climate change. Find a moment of joy in your day with NESCAFÉ Sweet & Creamy.
features: For Iced Coffee Lovers: NESCAFÉ Sweet & Creamy Iced Instant Coffee makes delicious iced coffee in an instant
Instant Coffee, Coffee Whitener & Sugar Together: Each instant iced coffee sachet includes the ideal amount of coffee, whitener, and sugar for a delicious taste every time
On-the-Go Convenience: Sweet & Creamy Instant Iced Coffee single-serve sachets are all you need for home or office, simply add cold water and ice for a great cup of iced coffee anytime, anywhere
Delicious Iced Coffee: Each refreshing cup has a smooth and creamy coffee taste
100% Responsibly Sourced Coffee: NESCAFÉ plans to continue helping 100,000+ coffee farmers with programs that aim to improve resilience to climate change
Coffee Experts: Crafted by NESCAFÉ, an expert in coffee innovations

description:
NESCAFÉ Iced Instant Coffee makes a refreshing and delicious iced coffee in an instant! From the experts in coffee innovations, NESCAFÉ Iced Instant Coffee is made to dissolve quickly and easily in cold water or milk -- no need to mix with hot water first.
To prepare, add 250mL of cold water or milk to one rounded teaspoon of this instant iced coffee powder, add ice if desired, and stir to enjoy some cool coffee refreshment. NESCAFÉ Iced Instant Coffee is specially roasted to deliver a smoother coffee flavour that provides a more refreshing taste when served cold.
NESCAFÉ plans to continue helping 100,000+ coffee farmers with programs that aim to improve resilience to climate change. NESCAFÉ – Make Your World.

title: Essentia Water
description: Taste the Difference. Feel the Hydration. Take hydration to the next level with ESSENTIA ionized alkaline water. A remineralized treated water with a pH level of 9.5 or higher that provides refreshing hydration and a clean, smooth taste. We use a proprietary process that can transform water from any source into ESSENTIA Water. First, we purify water through reverse osmosis and microfiltration to remove contaminants. Next, we infuse the water with trace amounts of electrolytes for a clean, smooth taste that complements the body’s natural mix. Finally, through the ionization process, bitter-tasting ions are removed, creating alkaline ESSENTIA Water. Our convenient 1L bottles are good for hydrating during your workout, a day at work, or on-the-go and are recyclable (be sure to remove the label first). ESSENTIA was established in 1998 with the mission to inspire people everywhere to do the things that matter to them most. Stay hydrated and stay after it with ESSENTIA Water.

Great Taste: ESSENTIA Water provides a clean, smooth taste cold or at room temperature
